Package comunication

Interface Summary
IComunicator This interface define all methods for IComunicator.
IPushNotification This interface defines all methods for a device that manages PUSH notification.
TransportLayerEventSource Thiss interface defines methods for add and remove listeners who are interested in the event of the TransportLayer.
TransportLayerListener This interface defines methods that is executed when an event is verified.
UdpPushEventSource This interface defines methods for adding/deleting UdpPushListener from listener's list.
UdpPushListener This interface defines methods for manage an event generated by UdpPushEventSource.
 

Class Summary
TcpComunicator This class implements IComunicator interface and defines methods for TCP comunication with Arduino board.
TransportLayer This class resolves comunication protocol request for sending/receiving bytes to/from Arduino and manages events for PUSH notifications.
TransportLayerEvent This class represents events generated by TransportLayer.
UdpComunicator  
UdpPushEvent This class implements all methods for events generated by Push Comunicator UDP.
UdpPushNotificator This class implement a comunicator that receives Push notifications.
 

Enum Summary
NetworkProtocol This enum define all network protocols managed by the middleware for interact with Arduino board.
